mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sittermember (sitter_id,cctv_agree,introduction,personality_check,license_check, activity_date, activity_time,residence1, residence2,residence3,pay) values(#{sitter_id}, #{cctv_agree},#{introduction}, #{personality_check},#{license_check},#{activity_date}, #{activity_time},#{residence1},#{residence2},#{residence3},#{pay})
mapper.select: SELECT s.*, m.name, m.image_path, m.starrate, TRUNC(trunc(months_between(sysdate,m.birthday))/12)+1 age from sittermember s inner join member m on s.sitter_id=m.id
SELECT s.*, m.name, m.image_path, m.starrate, m.gender, m.phone, TRUNC(trunc(months_between(sysdate,m.birthday))/12)+1 age from sittermember s inner join member m on s.sitter_id=m.id WHERE m.id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE sittermember SET premiumdate=sysdate+${param1} where sitter_id=#{param2}
UPDATE sittermember SET premium=trunc(premiumdate-sysdate) where sitter_id=#{param1}
UPDATE sittermember SET premium=0, premiumdate='' where sitter_id=#{param1}
